posts.post_content:
I would like to purchase a 1911 Obak graded by SGC (40 or 50) or PSA (3 or 4). Bues, Coy, Davis, Lamline, McCredie, Rapps, Reddick, Skeels, Speas, Williams, Zacher. Those would be my top wants (with the bolds at the top). Send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Let's see what you have!
Tony
